ai.summary: Laird's Trail is a 6 km moderate hike in the United Kingdom. The route offers a balanced mix of grassy paths and firmer trails, with occasional rocky sections and mild elevation gain, suitable for hikers with some experience.
ai.terrain_summary: The trail follows a combination of well-trodden paths and uneven sections. Expect grassy fields, compact earth, and occasional rocky steps. Ground conditions can be muddy after rain, and a modest ascent provides elevation gain without steep grades.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for changeable UK weather and variable trail conditions. Wear sturdy, waterproof footwear and bring a map or GPS. Pack a light rain jacket, warm layer, and enough water and snacks. Stay on marked paths, beware of slippery rocks after rain, and inform someone of your route and expected return time.
recommended_gear: Weather-appropriate clothing (layered) and a light rain jacket
Map or GPS device and a charged phone

seo.title: Laird's Trail – 6 km Moderate Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Laird's Trail, a 6 km moderate hike in the United Kingdom. Learn about terrain, safety tips, the best seasons, and gear to plan your trek.
